examples.full_description: Sessions POST /login with valid username and password returns the logged in user

examples.description: sets the user ID in the session
examples.full_description: Sessions POST /login with valid username and password sets the user ID in the session
Sessions POST /login with invalid password returns a 401 unauthorized response

examples.description: does not set the user ID in the session
examples.full_description: Sessions POST /login with invalid password does not set the user ID in the session
Sessions POST /login with invalid username returns a 401 unauthorized response

examples.description: does not set the user ID in the session
examples.full_description: Sessions POST /login with invalid username does not set the user ID in the session

examples.description: deletes the user ID from the session
examples.full_description: Sessions DELETE /logout deletes the user ID from the session
